text:
soma, how it all began - part 13 We have moved!
It is with great pleasure that we can inform you that we are now at your service in our new home - soma - the new centre for Maharishi Ayurveda and holistic medicine.
Our new address is: Reitting 4, 4682 Geboltskirchen, Austria.
Tel. No.: +43 (0)7732 45576
E-mail:
[praxis@somamed.at](mailto:praxis@somamed.at)
The last few days have been intense: the old locations of the practice and Ayurvedashop had to be closed down, the new soma location had to be finished and set up.
Up to 100 helping hands were active at the same time this week. The relocation teams mingled with the craftsmen who were finishing their trades in the new building and our numerous staff members who all eagerly helped with the relocation. The completion of the trades succeeded so far that we can start with Ayurveda shop, practice and the first Pancha Karma treatments on Monday, 21 February 2022. The first in-patient Pancha Karma guests will arrive on 28 February, which is also the day our kitchen and restaurant open.
While we are carefully starting up our business, there are still some craftsmen working in the house. Especially electricians, carpenters, IT technicians, plumbers and glaziers still have to complete their work.
Our employees are enthusiastic about their new workplace. How do you think they will like it? We are looking forward to your feedback!
The completion of the outdoor facilities (driveway, parking areas, landscaping) will take until the end of March.
